original_text:
Baron Samedi
È tempo di inchinarsi davanti all’onnipotente signore degli spiriti dei morti, il Barone Samedi! Il lancio di novembre di Yggdrasil vi porterà nel magico mondo del voodoo, dove il malizioso barone evoca grandi ricchezze per i giocatori.
Cogliete l’attimo, mortali, perché il barone vi garantirà che la magia nera vi accompagni in combo inedite nel regno dei vivi!
Baron Samedi è una slot con una caratteristica bonus intelligente che probabilmente non avete mai visto prima; si lega bene all’argomento e prolunga le rotazioni libere in modo fantasioso. Anche la grafica e gli effetti sonori sono ottimi e c’è un RTP bello e alto del 97,00%.
Una grafica misteriosa
Entra nel mondo del voodoo con le stravaganti slot Baron Samedi di Yggdrasil. La storia ruota attorno al Barone Samedi stesso. Egli è un loa dei morti, un birbante e l’uomo che non può morire. I loa sono gli spiriti di Vodou Haitiano e Louisiana Voodoo e, a differenza degli dei, dei santi o degli angeli, non vengono pregati, ma serviti.
Baron Samedi è una video slot con cinque rulli, tre file e 25 linee di pagamento.  È riproducibile su tutti gli apparecchi tra 0,25 e 125 euro.  Dispone di 36 caratteristiche collezionabili, tra cui wilds, moltiplicatori, linee di vincita garantita, stack e simboli misteriosi.  Le bobine girano su un vassoio di legno e metallo decorato con ossa, alcol, sigari, candele e dadi; la fila sopra le bobine contiene delle carte che spiegheremo più avanti nella recensione.
Ci sono molti loa diversi, ognuno con i propri tratti di personalità, ritmi sacri, danze, canti, canti, simboli rituali e modalità specifiche di servizio. Ad esempio, Damballa è considerato uno dei più importanti. È il padre del cielo e il creatore di tutta la vita, che governa la mente, l’intelletto e l’equilibrio cosmico. Papa Legba è un altro loa essenziale che funge da collegamento tra il loa e l’umanità e si ritiene che parli tutte le lingue umane.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Il simbolo più prezioso è il Barone in persona, che assegna 120 monete per l’atterraggio di cinque su una linea di pagamento completa. Il prossimo è la Baronessa, che vale 115 monete per la combinazione di cinque. Poi c’è la bambola voodoo maschile che paga 105 monete e la bambola femminile – cinque delle quali vi premieranno con 100 monete.
Poiché nessuno dei simboli appare impilato sui rulli in modalità normale, i giocatori dipendono fortemente dalla scheda caratteristica per generare le vittorie. Spieghiamo di più su di loro:
Il gioco viene fornito con un set di 36 carte collezionabili, ognuna delle quali rappresenta una caratteristica. Inoltre, ogni carta è classificata in forza da 1 a 4 – più alto è il rango, più forte è la carta:

I – 10 carte per riempire la collezione
II- 20 carte da riempire collezione
III- 40 carte da riempire collezione
IV- 50 carte da riempire collezione

Attivatelo atterrando tre, quattro o cinque dei teschi in qualsiasi punto in vista per i quali riceverete rispettivamente 7, 12 o 15 giri gratuiti; su ogni giro otterrete altre tre carte e le relative caratteristiche associate che verranno poi aggiunte alla vostra collezione.
Se una collezione di carte è completata, allora vengono assegnati tre giri extra con quella carta bloccata nella prima posizione sopra i rulli.
I simboli di alto valore nelle slot Baron Samedi includono il Barone, sua moglie Maman Brigitte e due bambole voodoo; le gemme di rosso, verde, blu e viola costituiscono i valori inferiori.
Il cranio dell’animale è selvatico e sostituirà tutti gli altri per aiutare a realizzare le partite vincenti, ad eccezione del simbolo del bonus cranio.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Probabilmente avrai scelto Baron Semedi, la Slot Machine prodotta da Yggdrasil, per il tema legato al mondo del Voodoo e della spiritualità. Se vuoi provare altre Slot Machine del genere in cui scommettere i tuoi soldi, ti consigliamo Voodoo Vibes, la Slot prodotta da NetEnt che ti permette di vincere fino a 75,000€ su una singola giocata.

raw_translation.response:
It's time to bow down to the omnipotent lord of the spirits of the dead, Baron Samedi! Yggdrasil's November release will take you to the magical world of voodoo, where the mischievous baron evokes great riches for players.

Seize the moment, mortals, because the baron will ensure that black magic accompanies you with unique combos in the realm of the living!

Baron Samedi is a slot with an intelligent bonus feature that you probably have never seen before. It ties well to the theme and prolongs free spins in a fantastical way. The graphics and sound effects are also excellent and there is a nice and high RTP of 97.00%.

Mysterious graphics

Enter the world of voodoo with the extravagant Baron Samedi slot by Yggdrasil. The story revolves around Baron Samedi himself. He is a loa of the dead, a scoundrel, and the man who cannot die.

The loa are the spirits of Haitian Vodou and Louisiana Voodoo and, unlike gods, saints, or angels, they are not prayed to but served.

Baron Samedi is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and 25 paylines. It is playable on all devices between 0.25 and 125 euros. It has 36 collectible features, including wilds, multipliers, guaranteed win lines, stacks, and mysterious symbols.

The reels spin on a tray of decorated wood and metal bones, alcohol, cigars, candles, and dice, and the row above the reels contains cards that we will explain later in the review.

There are many different loa, each with their own personality traits, sacred rhythms, dances, songs, ritual symbols, and specific modes of service. For example, Damballa is considered one of the most important. He is the father of heaven and the creator of all life, who rules the mind, intellect, and cosmic balance. Papa Legba is another essential loa who acts as a link between the loa and humanity and is believed to speak all human languages.

Functions and symbols of the slot machine

The most valuable symbol is Baron himself, who awards 120 coins for landing five on a complete payline. Next is the Baroness, who is worth 115 coins for a combination of five. Then there is the male voodoo doll that pays 105 coins and the female doll - five of which will reward you with 100 coins.

Since none of the symbols appear stacked on the reels in normal mode, players rely heavily on the feature card to generate wins. We'll explain more about them:

The game comes with a set of 36 collectible cards, each representing a feature. Additionally, each card is ranked in strength from 1 to 4 - the higher the rank, the stronger the card:

I - 10 cards to complete the collection
II- 20 cards to complete the collection
III- 40 cards to complete the collection
IV- 50 cards to complete the collection

Activate it by landing three, four, or five skulls anywhere in view for which you will receive 7, 12, or 15 free spins respectively. On each spin, you will get three more cards and the associated features that will then be added to your collection.

If a collection of cards is completed, then three extra spins are awarded with that card locked in the first position above the reels.

The high-value symbols in Baron Samedi slots include Baron, his wife Maman Brigitte, and two voodoo dolls; the gems of red, green, blue, and purple make up the lower values.

The animal skull is wild and will replace all others to help make winning matches, except for the bonus skull symbol.

Other similar slot machines

You have probably chosen Baron Semedi, the slot machine produced by Yggdrasil, for the theme related to the world of voodoo and spirituality. If you want to try other slot machines of the same genre to bet your money on, we recommend Voodoo Vibes, the slot produced by NetEnt that allows you to win up to €75,000 on a single bet.

Review: Baron Samedi

It's time to bow down to the all-powerful lord of the dead spirits, Baron Samedi! Yggdrasil's November release will take you into the magical world of voodoo, where the mischievous baron evokes great riches for players.

Seize the moment, mortals, because the baron will ensure that black magic accompanies you in unprecedented combos in the realm of the living!

Baron Samedi is a slot with a smart bonus feature that you probably have never seen before; it is relevant to the topic and prolongs the free spins in a whimsical way. Even the graphics and sound effects are excellent, and there is a nice and high RTP of 97.00%.

Mysterious Graphics

Enter the world of voodoo with the whimsical Baron Samedi slot machine from Yggdrasil. The story revolves around Baron Samedi himself. He is a loa of the dead, a rascal, and the man who cannot die. Loa are the spirits of Haitian Vodou and Louisiana Voodoo and, unlike gods, saints, or angels, they are not prayed to, but served.

Baron Samedi is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and 25 paylines. It is playable on all devices between 0.25 and 125 euros. It has 36 collectible features, including wilds, multipliers, guaranteed win lines, stacks, and mysterious symbols. The reels spin on a wooden and metal tray decorated with bones, alcohol, cigars, candles, and dice; the row above the reels contains cards that we will explain later in the review.

There are many different loa, each with their own personality traits, sacred rhythms, dances, songs, ritual symbols, and specific modes of service. For example, Damballa is considered one of the most important. He is the father of the sky and the creator of all life, who rules the mind, intellect, and cosmic balance. Papa Legba is another essential loa who serves as a link between the loa and humanity and is believed to speak all human languages.

Functions and Symbols of the Slot Machine

The most valuable symbol is Baron himself, who rewards 120 coins for landing five on a complete payline. Next up is the Baroness, who is worth 115 coins for the combination of five. Then there's the male voodoo doll that pays out 105 coins and the female doll - five of which will reward you with 100 coins.

Since none of the symbols appear stacked on the reels in normal mode, players heavily rely on the feature card to generate wins. We'll explain more about them:

The game comes with a set of 36 collectible cards, each representing a feature. Additionally, each card is ranked in strength from 1 to 4 - the higher the rank, the stronger the card:

I - 10 cards to fill the collection
II- 20 cards to fill the collection
III- 40 cards to fill the collection
IV- 50 cards to fill the collection

Activate it by landing three, four, or five skulls anywhere in view for which you will receive 7, 12, or 15 free spins respectively; on each spin, you will get three more cards and their associated features, which will then be added to your collection.

If a collection of cards is completed, then three extra spins are awarded with that card locked in the first position above the reels.

High-value symbols in the Baron Samedi slots include Baron, his wife Maman Brigitte, and two voodoo dolls; the red, green, blue, and purple gems make up the lower values.

The animal skull is wild and will substitute for all others to help make winning matches, except for the skull bonus symbol.

Other Similar Slot Machines

You have probably chosen Baron Samedi, the slot machine produced by Yggdrasil, for its theme related to the world of voodoo and spirituality. If you want to try other slot machines of this kind to bet your money on, we recommend Voodoo Vibes, the slot produced by NetEnt that allows you to win up to 75,000€ on a single play.
